body: Oh, not another customer... Oh Herm, it's you!
It seems every day the market gets busier and more competitive.
Being so tired all the time was not what I imagined when I started this endeavour.
I used to love growing raw food and making it into something tasty...
But ever since Mr. Moneycrabs bought out the rest of the market, my customers have dried up.
Every day is a struggle to keep the stall running.
I loved baking as child! What an amazing opportunity!

option_text: Would some gardening help clear your head?
body: Wow, Herm! This property is amazing!
A beautiful little place with quick access to an alloment. With this I could grow whatever I want!
